attributes.additional_details: All immigrants should go through stringent screening process Being tested for diseases, complete criminal checks (declined entry if anything found), DNA samples/finger prints then put on a asylum seekers database awaiting the decision and not allowed In to the uk until given a definitive yes, anyone found in the uk who is not on the database is then evicted and refused th right to enter the uk ever again, any asylum seeker succesfully residing here who is charged with a serious sexual/violent/fraudulent offence is evicted from the uk and unable to return.
